thread.title: Great Engagement Surprise
thread.title_full: Great Engagement Surprise - Review of The Ritz-Carlton New York, Battery Park, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Joseph L
title: Great Engagement Surprise
text: The staff helped ensure a very special and unique experience. I was nervous enough focusing on popping the question. They helped ensure a very romantic surprise back in the room. Thank god the answer was Yes! Only downside was the breakfast room service. Not worth the cost.
